site_name: Opus 2,  Land Between Crabtree Manorway NorthAnd Bronze Age WayCrabtree Manorway NorthBelvedereKent
description: Details of conditions 4(screen walls and fences), 12(construction methodology),13(external lighting), 17(infiltration and surface water drainage), 18(piling), 28(vehicle parking), 29(cycle storage), 35(highways alterations) and 36(non-road mobile machinery) pursuant to planning permission ref.16/00011/FULM dated 8.7.2016 for the erection of one building for light industrial (Use Class B1(c)); storage and distribution (Use Class B8) and/or Industrial (Use Class B2) purposes; ancillary offices and associated car parking, landscaping, servicing and access arrangements.
